CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1985 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1985 Code, as updated through May 3, 2015, which are included herein. Sections of the 1985 Code, as updated through May 3, 2015, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
